name: Department of Homelessness and Supportive Housing
description: The Department of Homelessness and Supportive Housing prevents and ends homelessness for people in San Francisco. Visit relevant SF Service Guide tiles for information on the shelter and housing resources HSH funds. For more information on the best way to access HSH services, [visit the Department's Services page] (https://hsh.sfgov.org/services/how-to-get-services/).
